data.title: Portland Trail Blazers Players Appearances
data.meta_description: Hire Portland Trail Blazers for player appearances at your next event. Sports Speakers 360 can help you connect with your favorite player.
data.text: The Portland Trial Blazers were founded in 1970. The Blazers are based in Portland Oregon. The team has won four division titles, three conference titles and one championship. The Blazers have played their home games at the Rose Garden since 1995. The Blazers play in the Northwest Division in the National Basketball Association. The Northwest Division includes the Denver Nuggets, Minnesota Timberwolves, Oklahoma City Thunder and Utah Jazz. Among their most famous players include Bill Walton, Brandon Roy, Clifford Robinson, Clyde Drexler, Jerome Kersey, John Paxson, Maurice Lucas and Terry Porter.
